tool.name: ACS5Yr

param.name: year
param.dialogReference: The year for which to extract the ACS 5-year estimates.

param.name: state
param.expression: [01] Alabama (AL) | [02] Alaska (AK) | [04] Arizona (AZ) | [05] Arkansas (AR) | [06] California (CA) | [08] Colorado (CO) | [09] Connecticut (CT) | [10] Delaware (DE) | [11] District of Columbia (DC) | [12] Florida (FL) | [13] Georgia (GA) | [15] Hawaii (HI) | [16] Idaho (ID) | [17] Illinois (IL) | [18] Indiana (IN) | [19] Iowa (IA) | [20] Kansas (KS) | [21] Kentucky (KY) | [22] Louisiana (LA) | [23] Maine (ME) | [24] Maryland (MD) | [25] Massachusetts (MA) | [26] Michigan (MI) | [27] Minnesota (MN) | [28] Mississippi (MS) | [29] Missouri (MO) | [30] Montana (MT) | [31] Nebraska (NE) | [32] Nevada (NV) | [33] New Hampshire (NH) | [34] New Jersey (NJ) | [35] New Mexico (NM) | [36] New York (NY) | [37] North Carolina (NC) | [38] North Dakota (ND) | [39] Ohio (OH) | [40] Oklahoma (OK) | [41] Oregon (OR) | [42] Pennsylvania (PA) | [44] Rhode Island (RI) | [45] South Carolina (SC) | [46] South Dakota (SD) | [47] Tennessee (TN) | [48] Texas (TX) | [49] Utah (UT) | [50] Vermont (VT) | [51] Virginia (VA) | [53] Washington (WA) | [54] West Virginia (WV) | [55] Wisconsin (WI) | [56] Wyoming (WY)
param.dialogReference: The state for which to extract the ACS 5-year estimates.

param.name: counties
param.dialogReference: The counties for which to extract the ACS 5-year estimates. Multiple selections may be made.

param.name: level
param.dialogReference: The geographic level for which to pull data. Levels are arranged from coarse to fine. The finer the geography, the less variables that are available.

param.name: census_variables
param.dialogReference: Select one or more ACS 5-year estimates to download. Go to the Census web page for variable definitions (WARNING: Hyperlinks will cause ArcGIS Pro 3.0 or lower to crash unless in Catalog View): 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021.

param.name: use_alias
param.dialogReference: Check the box to include descriptive field aliases in the output.

param.name: null_records
param.displayname: Drop variables where all records are null.
param.dialogReference: Check the box to exclude variables for which all records are null from the output.

param.name: margin_of_error
param.dialogReference: Check the box to include the margins of error alongside the ACS 5-year estimates.

param.name: geometries
param.dialogReference: Check the box to have the tool append the data to a feature class of census tracts.

param.name: output
param.displayname: Output (must be within a file geodatabase)
param.dialogReference: The output table name unless geometries are included, in which it will be the output feature class name.

tool.summary: This tool extracts variables from the U.S. Census Bureau's American Community Survey (ACS) 5-Year Estimates. A working Internet connection is required. Data may either be output as a stand alone table or users may optionally have the tool download the census tract boundaries and join the data to the tracts. Users may also elect to download the margin of error (MOE) of each variable. The tool utilizes data from web sites hosted by the U.S. Census Bureau and modifications to those sites by the host may cause the tool to malfunction.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Randolph Pullen, Planning Analyst II, rpullen@chattanooga.gov Chattanooga-Hamilton County Regional Planning Agency Chattanooga-Hamilton County/North Georgia Transportation Planning Organization
